cobblemon.species.hooh.name: Ho-Oh
cobblemon.species.hooh.desc1: Ho-Oh’s feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light.
cobblemon.species.hooh.desc2: These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers.
cobblemon.species.hooh.desc3: This Pokémon is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.
cobblemon.species.lugia.name: Lugia
cobblemon.species.lugia.desc1: Lugia’s wings pack devastating power—a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses.
cobblemon.species.lugia.desc2: As a result, this Pokémon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.
